extendedInfo.description: Letâs face it, we love our cats and our cats love themselves. All cats love to be in the focus of things, in the center of attention. Well if you love your cat, you have come to the right place!Cats Idol lets you browse through cat photos submitted by other users and rank them. Choose a cat photo as your wallpaper and add your own cat to the most famous cats in the world!With Cats Idol you can:1) Browse through cat photos submitted by other users2) Ranks Cats3) Set chosen cat photo as your wallpaper4) Submit your cat to Cats Idol - Make Your Cat Famous!
